function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of contagious diseases in indoor office environments","Impact":"Increased absenteeism and presenteeism, higher medical costs, decreased productivity","Mitigation":"Improving indoor air quality, reducing mold and dampness, implementing proper ventilation systems","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, humidity control systems, ventilation systems","People":"Employees, students, teachers, families","Owner":"Employers, building managers, school administrators"},{"Description":"Impact of musculoskeletal disorders on economic burden","Impact":"High economic burden due to direct and indirect costs, decreased productivity, health-related costs","Mitigation":"Ergonomic workplace design, regular workplace evaluations, employee wellness programs","Technologies":"Ergonomic furniture, adjustable workstations, workplace assessment tools","People":"Employees, employers, families","Owner":"Employers, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Health-related costs due to poor indoor environments","Impact":"Increased respiratory problems, asthma cases, health care system costs, decreased academic performance","Mitigation":"Eliminating mold and dampness, improving air quality, promoting healthy building standards","Technologies":"Mold remediation technologies, air quality monitoring systems, building certification programs","People":"Employees, students, teachers, families","Owner":"Building owners, government health agencies"}]}
